post.title: IPFS
post.body:
•IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) is a synthesis of well-tested internet technologies such as DHTs, the Git versioning system and Bittorrent. It creates a P2P swarm that allows the exchange of IPFS objects. The totality of IPFS objects forms a cryptographically authenticated data structure known as a Merkle DAG and this data structure can be used to model many other data structures. We will in this post introduce IPFS objects and the Merkle DAG and give examples of structures that can be modelled using IPFS.

•https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmbEt4yJaHZDeHsbKZ1pwH54RCkpyGRBRUzhSeQv2iWQ3K

•http://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmXtXwN6VZKjFqmEMXvrjEJxk6hvHJbynuVuzJyYT7Qk8f

post.title: Contracted Research
post.body: I am interested in any research related to love and making of love. Please let me know your particular interest, and for a nominal namecoins I can conduct the research on your behalf, even including search for a potential girlfriend through social media.

post.title: the triangle of life
post.body:
- family
- business
- lover

but this is not really solid, not even right probably....but we should think about it as a wishful starting point. one thing will have to go, the lover. 

but if lover goes, then replaced by what?
